SHM SHM> Device APE SHM Registers 0xC0014000
SEG_SIG APE_APE_MAGIC ('APE!') when all is well. 0x0
32 true

32 true

32 true

32 true

SEG_MESSAGE_BUFFER_OFFSET Specifies the offset of a scratchpad area, relative to the start of the APE SHM area (i.e., relative to APE_REG(0x4000)). 0x1c
32 true
SEG_MESSAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH Specifies the size of the scratchpad area in bytes. 0x20
32 true
4024 Unknown. Bootcode related. 0x24
32 true
4028 Unknown. Bootcode related. 0x28
32 true

32 true

NOP 0
READ_MEM 1
WRITE_MEM 2
CALL 3

32 true

32 true

32 true
Sig
0 32 read-write

RCPU_SEG_LENGTH Set to 0x34. 0x104
32 true
RCPU_INIT_COUNT Incremented by RX CPU every boot. 0x108
32 true

32 true
RCPU_CFG_FEATURE Set to 0x110
32 true
RCPU_PCI_VENDOR_DEVICE_ID Set to PCI Vendor/Device ID by S2. 0x114
32 true

16 16 read-write

32 true

32 true

32 true

32 true

32 true

32 true

32 true
HOST_SEG_LEN Set to 0x20. 0x204
32 true
HOST_INIT_COUNT Incremented by host on every initialization. 0x208
32 true

32 true

0x210
32 true
No PHYLock
0 1 read-write

PROT_MAC0_HIGH High 16 bits of MAC address 0. Only valid if 0x314

32 true

32 true

32 true

32 true

32 true
